text:
Memberi kecupan singkat di kening Winter, ia pikir itu sudah cukup buat menyakinkan gadis tersebut. Memeluk nya erat seolah tiada hari lagi buat mereka bersama
"Tiada bedanya kalau kamu hamil sekarang ataupun nanti. Aku sudah berjanji dengan mu dan Tuhan bahawa aku akan menikahi mu setulus hatiku dan aku bahkan mencintaimu seadanya" Winter menatap dalam manik hitam milik wanita kaya, mencari kebohongan yang ada disana namun ia yakin kata kata itu sungguh membuatnya terharu
"Jika kau hamil, bayi itu tetap jadi bayi kita. Aku akan menjadi mommy dan kamu bakal jadi mama nya" Karina tersenyum mengujarnya
" Thank you for everything, Karina. Aku harus memastikan kepercayaan mu hanya ada buat aku bukan untuk yang lain. Karna aku takut jika nanti kau akan meninggalkan ku sendirian"
trans:
Giving a peck on Winter's forehead, she thinks it is enough to convince that girl. Hugging her tightly as though there were no more days for both of them
"There is no difference whether you get pregnant now or later. I have promised to you and God that I will marry you with all my heart and I even love you as you are" Winter gazes deeply into the rich girl's black eyes, looking for any sense of lies there but she is sure that the words really moved her
"If you get pregnant, the baby is still our baby. I will be a mommy and you will be his/her mom" Karina said smiling.
"Thank you for everything, Karina. I need to make sure that your trust is only for me not for others. Because I am afraid that you will leave me alone"
